attributes.title: Stop The Hindu Holocaust - Human-Divine Conflict Is Neither Right Nor Good!
attributes.description:
14 AUGUST 2020

*PARAMASHIVA’S MESSAGE DIRECTLY FROM KAILASA:

*CONSCIOUS ELASTICITY IS THE ABILITY TO UNCLUTCH AND INVOLVE.

*IN SANSKRIT, WE USE THE WORD “SAHAJA SAMADHI” - ABILITY TO BE ABSOLUTELY STRESS-FREE BUT ALIVE, ACTIVE, VIBRANT.

*I CAN SIT IN NIRVIKALPA SAMADHI THE WHOLE DAY IN THIS PADMASANA AND GO ON RELEASING THE IDEAS ABOUT THE CURRENCY OF KAILASA!

*USUALLY PRESIDENTS, PRIME MINISTERS, HEADS OF STATES, IF THEY WANT TO ANNOUNCE SOMETHING TO THE WORLD, THERE WILL BE A FORMAL PRESS MEET. THEY WILL ANNOUNCE DURING THE PRESS MEET. THEY WILL ANSWER THE QUESTIONS AND THEN IT WILL BE TAKEN TO THE WORLD. HERE, I DID NOT EVEN MAKE THE ANNOUNCEMENT. I SAID I WILL MAKE THE ANNOUNCEMENT ON GANESH CHATURTHI ABOUT THE CURRENCY OF KAILASA. BUT IT IS ALL OVER INTERNATIONAL MEDIA!

*I FINISHED THE SATSANG AND SAT IN SAMADHI, ATTENDED TO MY PUJA AND ALL MY SPIRITUAL ACTIVITIES AND WHEN I CAME BACK, IT IS FLASHING ALL OVER THE WORLD ABOUT RESERVE BANK OF KAILASA!

*I ONLY SAID WE ARE READY TO ANNOUNCE AND WE ARE GOING TO BE ANNOUNCING. WE ARE READY WITH ALL THE ECONOMIC POLICIES. I WAS PLANNING THAT, IN THIS 10-DAY BRAHMOTSAVAM I WILL DETAIL OUT ALL THE ECONOMIC POLICIES WITH SHASTRA PRAMANA IN BOTH LANGUAGES.

*THE POLICIES ARE FORMED BASED ON SANSKRIT SCRIPTURES AND THEY ARE IN SANSKRIT, TRANSLATED INTO ENGLISH AND TAMIL.

* I AM STILL NOT ABLE TO LOGICALLY UNDERSTAND WHY THIS RESERVE BANK OF KAILASA BECAME SO POPULAR AND VIRAL!

*CONSCIOUS ELASTICITY MEANS, ABILITY TO COMPLETELY UNCLUTCH AND ABILITY TO FULLY INVOLVE. THIS ABILITY GETS BUILT INTO YOUR SYSTEM WHEN YOU START ENJOYING UNCLUTCHING MORE AND MORE.

*THERE WAS A GREAT SAINT RAMALINGA VALLALAR IN SOUTH INDIA. HE GIVES THE BEAUTIFUL THREE TEACHINGS:

PASITTIRU - TANITTIRU - VIZHITTIRU

PASITTIRU MEANS: ALWAYS THE BODY SHOULD FEEL HUNGER. YOU SHOULD NEVER DUMP THE BODY WITH FOOD. ALWAYS THE BODY SHOULD BE FUNCTIONING, ALIVE, HUNGRY, AND THE DIGESTIVE FIRE JATARAGNI SHOULD BE BURNING.

*EVEN DURING THE HOMA, IF YOU DUMP THE WHOLE THING ON THE FIRE, THE FIRE WILL CHOKE. YOU SHOULD DO IN SUCH A WAY THE FIRE IS NOT OVERLOADED. SAME WAY, THE JATARAGNI - THE FIRE IN YOUR STOMACH RESPONSIBLE FOR DIGESTION SHOULD NOT BE OVERLOADED. IT SHOULD BE KEPT ALIVE, CONSTANTLY BURNING, EXCITED, INSPIRED!

* PASITTIRU MEANS ‘BE HUNGRY’

*TANITTIRU MEANS ‘BE UNCLUTCHED’

*VIZHITTIRU MEANS ‘BE ALIVE’

THESE THREE WILL ENSURE CONSCIOUS ELASTICITY HAPPENING IN YOU.

*HUMAN MIND IS CAPABLE OF MANIFESTING EVERYTHING IN LIFE.

*YOU ARE ABSOLUTELY CAPABLE OF MANIFESTING ALL THE POWERS AND POSSIBILITIES OF PARAMASHIVA.

*BUT DELUSION IS FORCIBLY DUMPED ON YOU BY SOCIETY, BY THE BRAINWASHING EDUCATION SYSTEM.

*SOCIETY DOES NOT WANT CLASSY PEOPLE. IT WANTS MEDIOCRES. ONLY THEN IT CAN CONTINUE TO EXPLOIT YOU AND YOU WILL BE LIKE SHEEP. THAT IS WHY THE EDUCATION TEACHES YOU THAT IF YOU ARE UNCLUTCHED YOU WILL NOT BE ACTIVE, ENJOYING LIFE AND IF YOU ARE NOT ACTIVE, YOU ARE CONSIDERED WITHDRAWN. THIS IS STUPIDITY TAUGHT TO YOU.

*IF YOU LEARNT ONLY ‘OUTGOING’, YOU WILL COLLAPSE IN DEPRESSION. IF YOU LEARN ONLY ‘GOING INSIDE’, YOU WILL NOT COLLAPSE IN DEPRESSION, BUT MAYBE YOU WILL BE A LITTLE IMPRACTICAL WITH THE OUTER WORLD.

*REAL UNCLUTCHING IS NEITHER GOING ONLY INWARD NOR ONLY GOING OUTWARD; IT IS EXPANDING YOUR CONSCIOUS ELASTICITY.

*THE MORE YOU LEARN UNCLUTCHING, THE MORE YOU WILL HAVE THE ABILITY TO GO INWARD AND YOU WILL HAVE SO MUCH EXCITEMENT AND DEEP INVOLVED THINKING THROUGH.

*SO MANY CELEBRITIES WHO ARE ABSOLUTELY OUTGOING ARE DEPRESSED AND SUICIDAL IN PERSONAL LIFE. IT IS NOT ACCIDENT. BY THE FUNDAMENTAL LOGIC OF MACAULAY EDUCATION AND BRAINWASHING, AN ‘ONLY OUTGOING PERSON’ HAS TO BE SUICIDAL. WHETHER COMEDIANS OR ANY CELEBRITY OR CELEBRITY JOURNALISTS, THE ‘ONLY OUTGOING’ WILL BE SUICIDAL.

*YOU HAVE TO HAVE THE CAPACITY TO BE IN ABSOLUTE TURIYATITA-TURIYATITA, IN NIRVIKALPA SAMADHI AND JAGRAT-JAGRAT - ACTIVE AND INVOLVED.

*CONSCIOUS ELASTICITY MEANS, YOU CAN CATCH A THOUGHT BEFORE IT FORMS INSIDE YOU - MICROSCOPIC - AND YOU CAN SEE THE STARS AND ITS PATH - TELESCOPIC - AND KNOW THE PATH IT IS TRAVELING.

*YOU ARE SIMPLY CAPABLE OF IT.

READ MORE AT: https://www.facebook.com/ParamahamsaNithyananda/posts/4226470180774133
